items.name: Mug of Ale
items.description: A frothy mug of the tavern's house ale.

items.name: Hearty Stew
items.description: A warm, filling stew with chunks of meat and vegetables.

items.name: Loaf of Bread
items.description: A fresh loaf of crusty bread.

items.name: Map Fragment (Grove)
items.description: Part of a map showing a path to a hidden grove.

items.name: Minor Healing Potion
items.description: Restores a small amount of health.

items.name: Spiced Potatoes
items.description: Warm, spiced potatoes that fill the belly and settle the nerves.

items.name: Traveler's Ration
items.description: Hardy, preserved food for a long journey. Bolsters stamina.

items.name: Mystery Brew
items.description: A frothy, strange-smelling drink from the back of the cellar. Effects unknown... or are they?

items.name: Ale Token
items.description: A wooden token redeemable for one mug of ale.

items.name: Gene's Deluxe Ale
items.description: A special brew, much richer and more potent than the usual swill. A rare treat!
